content: the new addition to our gnome collection is the bumble bee gnome this crochet bumble bee will make you smile and i promise it doesn t sting perfect gift for a friend who loves bees or even is a beekeeper > the free pattern of the bumble bee gnome will be available on the blog on the 5th of june the pdf pattern includes the following - both of the bumble bee gnomes - mini bumble bee toy on the hat - the mini bee applique -the daisy flower applique -the mini flower applique it contains 11 pages with written instructions and many photos to guide you through the pattern skill level- easy/ beginner
